beer.name: John's Locker Stock: Paul's Black Lager
beer.description: PBL' is jet black in color with a medium to full body. Seemless and deftly balanced--drinks like silk. Unfiltered and Unfined.
beer.grains: 2-row Pale, Melanoidin and Carafoam Special II, Black and Chocolate.
2-row Pale, Melanoidin and Carafoam Special II, Black and Chocolate.
